hero.title: Simela
hero.description: Ubulungiswa abuhlelelwe kuphela labo abangakuthenga. Sinika abantu ithemba lapho kungathi alikho, futhi siqinisekisa ukuthi ubulungiswa buyafika kubo bonke
hero.quote: Mela iqiniso, ngisho noma ume wedwa.

raf.title: Mayelana Namacala Ezingozi Zomgwaqo(RAF)
raf.description: Sisiza ngezimangalo ze-Road Accident Fund . Siyakweseka icala lize lifike emaphethelweni kanye nakuzo zonke izingxoxo.

medical.title: Ukunganakwa Kwezokwelapha
medical.description: Sisiza ezimeni lapho iziguli zibhekene nokungaphatheki kahle ezikhungeni zasemthola mpilo.

arrest.title: Ukuboshwa Okungekho Emthethweni
arrest.description: Sisebenza kanzima ukubuyisa isithunzi kulabo abasolwa ngamacala abangawenzanga. Uma uvalelwe ngokungemthetho, ubufakazi bungekho, silwela amalunelo akho

civil.title: Amacala Asivili
civil.description: Sisiza ngokukuvikela amalungelo, ukuxazulula izingxabano, nokuqinisekisa ubulungiswa empilweni yansuku zonke. Noma kungaba yingxabano yesivumelwano noma ingxabano yebhizinisi, simela okufanele.

employment.title: Umthetho Webaqashi Kanye Nabasebenzi
employment.description: Silekeleka ukuqiniseka ukuthi amalungelo akho njengomsebenzi alandelwa njengokuqokwa kwawo ngokomthetho kahulumeni.

family.title: Umthetho Womndeni Nokuhlukaniswa
family.description: Siyakweseka uma ubhekena nezingxoxo zesehlukaniso somndeni.

estate.title: Ukuhlela Ifa Nokucubungula
estate.description: Vikela ifa lakho futhi uvikele ikusasa labathandekayo bakho

contract.title: Ukuhlelwa Nokubuyekezwa Kwezivumelwano
contract.description: Sisiza ngezivumelwano ngobuchwepheshe ukuze uvikele amalungelo akho kanye nezintshisekelo zakho.

debt.title: Ukuqoqa Izikweletu
debt.description: Izinsizakalo zokubuyiswa kwezikweletu ezisebenzayo ukuvikela ibhizinisi lakho

criminal.title: Ukuzivikela Ebugebenguini
criminal.description: Ukumelwa kokuzivikela ebugebenguini okunolwazi oluvikela inkululeko yakho
criminal.why: Amalungelo akho, ikusasa lakho, inkululeko yakho

contact.title: Xhumana
contact.subtitle: Sithinte namuhla ukuze uthole iseluleko
contact.address:
303 Anton Lembede Street, Ipulangwe lesi-5
Durban Club Place, eThekwini, 4001

form.name: Igama Eliphelele
form.errorDesc: Sicela uzame futhi noma usithinte ngqo ngocingo noma nge-imeyili.

personal.title: Ukunakwa Komuntu Ngamunye
personal.description: Wonke amakhasimende asebenza ngqo nami — awadluliselwa esuka edesikini kuya kwesinye. Uthola ukuhlanganyela kwami siqu kusuka ekuxoxeni kuze kube sekuxazululweni. Asiphathi amakhasimende njengamafayela; siwaphatha njengabantu.

commitment.title: Ukuzinikela Okufakazelwe
commitment.description: Ngithatha wonke amacala siqu futhi ngilwela sengathi uyicala lami. Ukugxila kwami akukwiningi, kodwa kumphumela — ukuthola imiphumela yangempela nokwakha ukwethenjwa kwempilo yonke.

integrity.title: Ubuqotho Nemiphumela
integrity.description: Ngiqotho ngamathuba akho, sobala ngezindleko, futhi ngingaloki ekuzuzeleni imiphumela efanele. Ukugxila kwami akukuphumelela kuphela — kukwenza okulungile kuwe.

footer.copyright: © {{year}} I-LS Gumede Attorneys. Wonke amalungelo agodliwe.

faq.title: Imibuzo
faq.subtitle: Lena yimibuzo engiyizwa kakhulu kumakhasimende amasha. Uma unezinye izinkathazo, ungabeki izinsolo ukubuza ngesikhathi sokuseluleka kwakho.

questions.a: Icala ngalinye liyingqayizivele. Ngesikhathi sokuseluleka kwethu kokuqala, ngizobuyekeza isimo sakho ngobuqotho futhi nginikeze ukuhlolwa okucacile kwamathuba akho. Ngithatha amacala lapho ngikholelwa khona ngempela ukuthi ngingenza umehluko. Uma icala lakho linempikiswano, ngizolwela wena ngakho konke enginakho.

Isikhathi siyahluka kuye ngokuyinkimbinkimbi yecala lakho nezinqubo zomthetho ezibandakanyekayo. Ngesikhathi sokuseluleka kwethu, ngizokunikeza isikhathi esingokoqobo okusekelwe kumacala afanayo. Ngizokugcina unolwazi esinyathelweni ngasinye sendlela, ukuze uhlale wazi lapho sima khona.

questions.q: Izimali zakho zingakanani, futhi singenza izivumelwano zokukhokha?
questions.a: Ngikholelwa ukuthi ukumelwa komthetho kufanele kutholakale. Ngesikhathi somhlangano wethu wokuqala, ngizoba sobala ngezindleko futhi ngixoxe ngezivumelwano zokukhokha ezisebenzela isimo sakho. Ukugxila kwami kusekusizeni wena, hhayi ekudaleni ukucindezeleka kwezezimali. Ake sixoxe ngalokho okungenzeka.

Akufanele. Amacala amaningi axazululwa ngokuxoxisana nokuxazulula ngaphandle kokungena enkantolo. Umshushisi omuhle uyakusiza ugweme ukushushisana okungadingekile, ukulondoloza isikhathi, imali, nokucindezeleka. Uma enkantolo idingeka, ngizoba lapho nawe, ngilungele ngokugcwele ukulwela amalungelo akho.

questions.q: Yimaphi amadokhumenti okufanele ngiwalethe noma ngilungiselele?
questions.a: Letha noma yimaphi amadokhumenti onayo ahlobene necala lakho — imibiko yamaphoyisa, imibiko yezokwelapha, izivumelwano, ukuxhumana, izithombe, noma noma yiziphi ezinye izinto ezifanelekile. Ungakhathazeki uma unganazo zonke. Sizosebenzela ukuqoqa lokho esikudingayo. Vele woza neqiniso lakho nokwethemba kwakho.

Ukuxhumana kubalulekile. Ngisebenzisa i-WhatsApp, i-imeyili, izingcingo, nemihlangano yobukhona ukukukwazisa. Awusoze uzibuz ukuthi kwenzakalani ngecala lakho. Ngitholakala, ngiphendula ngokushesha, futhi ngizinikele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi uzizwa ubambe iqhaza ohendweni lwakho lobulungiswa.

testimonials.title: Izindaba
testimonials.subtitle: Icala ngalinye liyindaba yomuntu okufanele ixoxwe futhi ilwelwe ngobuqotho nothando. Nazi izibonelo zamakhasimende esesize.
testimonials.quote: Ukuwina icala akukona ngokuzidla noma ukunqoba — kumayelana nokukhululeka nokubuyiselwa. Ukubona isimo ebusweni bekhasimende lapho ubulungiswa sebunikeziwe — leso sikhathi lapho izinyembezi ziguquka zibe ukubonga — leyo ngenye indawo yangempela.

cases.situation: Ikhasimende elaliboshwe ngokungalungile futhi lagcinwa izinsuku ngaphandle kobufakazi. Lapho liza kithi, lalilahlekelwe ukukholelwa ohlelweni lobulungiswa — lalizwa lingenamandla futhi lihlazekile.
cases.outcome: Saphenya ngokucophelela futhi salwa ngokukhuthala saze safinyelela ekukhululweni kwalo futhi sathola inhlawulo yokuphulwa kwamalungelo alo. Ukubuka libuyisa isithunzi salo sakusikhumbuza ukuthi kungani senza lomsebenzi.

cases.situation: Ngemuva kwengozi ebhubhisayo, ikhasimende lalicindezelwe yizikweletu zokwelapha, lingakwazi ukusebenza, futhi lalingazi ukuthi lizoya kuphi. Inqubo yenhlawulo yayibonakala ingelula ukulandelwa yedwa.
cases.outcome: Saphatha zonke imininingwane yesimangalo se-RAF, safinyelela inhlawulo eyavumela ukuba ligxile ekuphuleni futhi lakhe kabusha impilo yalo. Lashintsha kusukela ekuzizweni lilahlwe uhlelo kuya ekuzizweni lisekelwa futhi linethemba.

cases.situation: Umnikazi webhizinisi elincane ebhekene nengxabano yesivumelwano eyinkimbinkimbi eyayisongela ukubhanga inkampani yabo. Bezizwa besongelwe imithombo yeqembu eliphikisayo nethimba lomthetho.
cases.outcome: Ngokuxoxisana okuhlakaniphile nokuzinikela okungaguquki, safinyelela isivumelwano esifanele esavikela ibhizinisi labo nempilo yabo. Ubulungiswa abukona ukuthi ubani onemali eningi — kumayelana nalokho okulungile.

whatToExpect.title: Kulindeleke
whatToExpect.subtitle: Inqubo yomthetho akufanele ibe yinkimbinkimbi noma yesabisayo. Nanku kahle ukuthi sizosebenzisana kanjani ukufinyelela ubulungiswa.
whatToExpect.quote: Awudingi ukuza nazo zonke izimpendulo — lokho ngumsebenzi wami. Woza neqiniso lakho, amadokhumenti akho, nokwethemba kwakho. Sobabili, sizothola indlela engcono kakhulu yokuhamba phambili.

steps.title: Ukuxhumana Kokuqala
steps.description: Thintana nge-foni, ngo-WhatsApp, nge-imeyili, noma gcwalisa ifomu lethu lokuxhumana. Sizohlela isikhathi sokuseluleka. Akukho ukwahlulela, akukho ukucindezelwa — nje ingxoxo.

steps.title: Ukuseluleka Kwasehhovisi
steps.description: Sihlangana ngobukhona ukuxoxa ngecala lakho ngokuningiliziwe. Ngizolalela indaba yakho, ngibuyekeze amadokhumenti akho, futhi ngikunike ukuhlolwa okungokoqobo. Uzohamba wazi kahle ukuthi umi kuphi.

steps.title: Ngesikhathi Secala Lakho
steps.description: Uma sesiqale, awusoze usale uzibuza. Ngizokugcina unolwazi nge-WhatsApp, izingcingo, ama-imeyili, nemihlangano. Uzozwisisa isinyathelo ngasinye senqubo nesinqumo ngasinye esenzayo sobabili.

steps.title: Ukuxazululwa
steps.description: Noma ngokuxoxisana, ukuxazulula, noma ukunqoba enkantolo, sisebenza ngokukhuthala ukufinyelela umphumela ongcono kakhulu. Lapho ubulungiswa sebunikeziwe, sigubha sobabili — sazi ukuthi senze okulungile kuwe.

hero.title: Izwi
hero.subtitle: Isuselwe ekukholweni lokuthi wonke umuntu ufanele ukuzwakala, ukuhlonishwa, futhi amelwe ngobuqotho obungaguquguquki.

story.title: Indaba Yami
story.paragraph1: Kusukela ngiselula, ngangishaqiswa yizinkinga zabantu abavamile ababengenabantu ababakhulumela. Ngibonile ukuthi kulula kanjani abantu abathambile ukuthuliswa yizinhlelo zomthetho eziyinkimbinkimbi nokuthi izwi elilodwa — elinolwazi, elizimisele, nelinozwelo — lingashintsha impilo yomuntu yonke.
story.paragraph2: Ukuba umshushisi akuzange kube ukhetho lomsebenzi kuphela kimi; kwakuwukubizwa ukumelela ubulungiswa, ukunikeza abantu ithemba lapho kungathi alikho, nokuqinisekisa ukuthi ubulungiswa abugodliwe kuphela labo abakwaziyo ukukuthenga.
story.paragraph3: Ngasungula inkampani yami yomthetho ngoba bengifuna ukusebenza umthetho ngendlela yami — ngenhliziyo, ukutholakala, nokunanzelela kwangempela amakhasimende ami. Ezinkampanini ezinkulu, amakhasimende avame ukuba izinombolo zamacala nje. Bengifuna ukudala indawo lapho wonke ikhasimende lizwa lizwakala, lihlonishwa, futhi libambe iqhaza ohambweni lwalo lobulungiswa.

values.title: Izimiso Zethu Eziyinhloko
values.subtitle: Izimiso eziqondisa ukusebenza kwethu futhi zichaza ukuzinikela kwethu ekuphakameni

integrity.title: Ubuqotho
integrity.description: Ukwenza okulungile, ngisho noma kungekho muntu obukayo. Angisoze ngithathe icala elakhiwe ngamanga noma izimangalo ezingamanga. Ukuzinikela kwami kusekuqinisweni nasebulungisweni, hhayi ekunqobeni nganoma yiluphi indleko.

compassion.title: Uzwelo
compassion.description: Icala ngalinye libandakanya indaba yomuntu efanele ukuhlonishwa nokuzwelana. Awuyona inombolo yecala; ungumuntu onokwesaba kwangempela, amathemba, namalungelo.

excellence.title: Ukuphakama
excellence.description: Ukunikela ngokusemandleni ami kuwo wonke amakhasimende, njalo. Ukugxila kwami akukona ekunqobeni kuphela — kusekwenzeni okulungile kuwe nasekufinyeleni imiphumela efanele.

accountability.title: Ukuziphendulela
accountability.description: Ukuma namakhasimende ami nezwi lami. Lapho ngithatha icala lakho, ngilwela wena sengathi licala lami.

justice.title: Ubulungiswa
justice.description: Ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ubulungiswa, isithunzi, nokulingana kugcinwa kukho konke esikwenzayo. Ubulungiswa bangempela kusho ukulinganisa — ukuphatha wonke umuntu ngesithunzi kungakhathaleki ukuthi uvela kuphi noma unemali engakanani.

leadership.title: Ubuholi
leadership.subtitle: Iqondiswa ngolwazi, ishukuntshiswa ukuphakama
leadership.bio1: Ngolwazi olunzulu kumacala e-RAF, ukunganakwa kwezokwelapha, ukuboshwa okungekho emthethweni, nokushushisana kwabantu, uLindokuhle ukhethekile emacaleni aya enhliziyweni yesithunzi somuntu. Indawo ngayinye ibonisa ukuzinikela kubantu, hhayi amaphepha kuphela.
leadership.bio2: Usuku lwakhe oluvamile luqala enkantolo emela amakhasimende, bese kuthi ntambama ahlangane nabantu abadinga isiqondiso, ebuyekeza ubufakazi, nokwenza amadokhumenti. Phakathi kokuvela enkantolo nokuseluleka, uphindela izingcingo, exoxisa ngokuxazulula, futhi efundisa abasebenzi abasha.
leadership.bio3: "Uma bengangesiye umshushisi, bengisasiza abantu — mhlawumbe njengothisha noma umsebenzi womphakathi. Ngake ngaba nothando lokunika abanye amandla, ikakhulukazi labo abazizwa bengenazwi noma bekhanyelelwe."
leadership.bio4: Lapho engekho enkantolo noma ehhovisi, uLindokuhle ubuyisela amandla ngokubuka ibhola lezinyawo neragibhi. Kunalokhu kulinganisa ukucindezeleka nobuntu okumenza kungabi ngumshushisi osebenzayo kuphela, kodwa ummeleli othembekile oqonda ngempela abantu asebenzela.

hero.title: Izinsizakalo
hero.subtitle: Sixazulula izinkinga zomthetho ngokuphelele. Siyaqikelela ukwehlelela izixazululo ngendlela elungele wonke ama klayenti esisebenzisana nawo.

cta.title: Udinga Usizo Lwezomthetho?
cta.description: Awuboni insizakalo oyidingayo? Sithinte namuhla ukuze uthole iseluleko ukuze sixoxe ngendaba yakho yomthetho.
